replies.body:
unless you're lux.
there's an unspoken rule that your E will NEVER oneshot the mage minions
Unless you get fed to the point of it being ungodly. Like four levels above the enemy's highest level fed.

i've been 12-0 with the highest cs in the game 15 minutes in and I couldn't oneshot mage minions with blue on lux.
it's impossible i say, impossible
But did you have enough AP to make rainbows fly out of your skirt?

That's what it feels like to farm minions with Rumble when you have 3+ items

But in the early game, oh my god, last hitting with Rumble while he has Q active is a nightmare
Meanwhile jungler: "OMG STOP PUSHING I CANT GANK FFS, REPORT, AFK, NOOBS!"

this feels like {{champion:92}} wave clear when I tried playing her last time. I know she has 3 AOE's in her Q, an AOE stun and every ability empowers her next basic,  but I'm still amazed by that wave clear.
